                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 8.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1006.72em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-8"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-9" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-10" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-11" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-14" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.13em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-15"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">273</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm \frac{C}{5}=\frac{F-32}{9}=\frac{K-273}{5} </script></span></p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.3em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-21"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm C=K</script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="width: 5.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.47em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-26"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">273</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm C=C-273</script></span>&nbsp;; যা সম্ভব নয়।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="width: 3.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1003.08em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-33"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>≠</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm \therefore C\neq K</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি রোধ থার্মোমিটার 0℃ তাপমাত্রায় রোধ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.57</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="width: 3.392em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.759em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.72em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-39"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.57</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2.57</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm 2.57\ \Omega</script></span> ও 100℃ তাপমাত্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3.57</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="width: 3.392em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.759em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.72em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-44"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.57</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3.57</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">3.57\ \Omega</script></span> পাঠ দেখালে 33℃ তাপমাত্রায় কত পাঠ দিবে?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>100</mn></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>33</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.57</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3.57</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.57</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="width: 17.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1014.43em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-49"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.13em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-53"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-54"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-58"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.71em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-61"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-64"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-65"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-68"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.83em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">33</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.54em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-77"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-78"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.57</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.08em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.514em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-83"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3.57</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.57</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.2em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.199em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>100</mn></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>33</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>2.57</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3.57</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2.57</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm \theta=\frac{R_f-R_0}{R_{100}-R_0}\times100\Rightarrow33=\frac{R_f-2.57}{3.57-2.57}\times100</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.33</mn><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.57</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.9</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x03A9;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="width: 14.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1011.76em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-90"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.33</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2.57</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.9</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Ω</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>0.33</mn><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>2.57</mn><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.9</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \Rightarrow0.33=R_f-2.57\therefore R_f=2.9\ \Omega\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="width: 3.372em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="width: 3.372em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.735em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.186em, 1002.74em, 2.735em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-120"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.048em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="padding-left: 0.184em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.64em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.271em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.225em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.64em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.64em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm -\gamma.\frac{V}{P} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="width: 1.141em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-128"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-129"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.64em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="width: 14.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1011.89em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-133"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-135"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-151"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-153" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-154"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-156"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-158"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi>γ</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi>γ</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm PV^\gamma=constant\ \Rightarrow\frac{d}{dV}\left(PV^\gamma\right)=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></msup><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-164" style="width: 18.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.699em, 1015em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-165"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-168"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.39em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-169"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-170"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-173"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-174"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-197"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.24em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1003.12em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.555em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-202"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-206"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.99em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-207"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-208"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 1.027em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-211"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-212"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-216"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.24em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.24em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>γ</mi><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi>γ</mi></msup><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi>γ</mi></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm \Rightarrow\gamma{\rm PV}^{\gamma-1}+V^\gamma.\frac{dP}{dV}=0\Rightarrow\frac{dP}{dV}=\frac{-\gamma.{\rm PV}^{\gamma-1}}{V^\gamma}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.17em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-220"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-223"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-226"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.66em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>γ</mi><mo>.</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm \therefore\frac{dP}{dV}=-\gamma.\frac{P}{V}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্বাভাবিক তাপমাত্রা ও চাপে শুষ্ক বায়ুকে হঠাৎ সংকুচিত করে আয়তন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="width: 0.859em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1000.71em, 2.722em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-237"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-238"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.689em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.69em, 2.735em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-262"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-263"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.458em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.46em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.458em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>γ</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>γ</mi></msubsup><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm P_1V_1^\gamma=P_2V_2^\gamma\therefore P_2=1\times\left(\frac{v}{\frac{v}{8}}\right)^\frac{4}{3}=1\times\left(8\right)^\frac{4}{3}=16\ atm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো কার্নো ইঞ্জিন 227℃ তাপমাত্রার উৎস হতে 950J তাপ গ্রহণ করে তা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>23</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="width: 3.541em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.908em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.83em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-324"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-326"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">23</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>23</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm-23^\circ C</script></span> তাপমাত্রার গ্রাহকে বর্জন করলে, বর্জিত তাপের পরিমাণ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1900</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="width: 3.418em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.78em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.74em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-331"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1900</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1900</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm 1900\ J </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>250</mn><mn>500</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>950</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>475</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="width: 16.395em;
