clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">950</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">475</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>250</mn><mn>500</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>950</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>475</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm \frac{Q_2}{Q_1}=\frac{T_2}{T_1}\Rightarrow Q_2=\frac{250}{500}\times950\ J=475\ J </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>127℃ তাপমাত্রার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="width: 3.839em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.132em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.13em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-384"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm 0.5\ mol</script></span> আদর্শ গ্যাসকে রুদ্ধতাপীয় প্রক্রিয়ার মাধ্যমে 27℃ তাপমাত্রায় নেওয়া হলো। এতে কৃতকাজের পরিমাণ কত?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B3;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="width: 15.017em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1012.18em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-391"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">γ<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">1.4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-406"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.263em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-408"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-409"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-434"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-435"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-456"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">400</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">300</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1.4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>400</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>0.4</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm W=\frac{nR}{\gamma-1}\ \left(T_1-T_2\right)=\frac{0.5\times8}{1.4-1}\times\left(400-300\right) =\frac{4}{0.4}\times100=1000\ J </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 90px;"></p>

<p>লেখচিত্রে কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.685em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কৃতকাজ = আয়তের ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="width: 9.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.79em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-562"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-566"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-567"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-576"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-578" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm =\left(P_2-P_1)(V_2-V_1\right)</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>1 kg ভরের পানির তাপমাত্রা 9&nbsp;মিনিটে 63℃ হতে 48℃ এ নেমে আসে। তাপ হ্রাসের হার কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4200</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>7000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mover><mo movablelimits=&quot;true&quot; form=&quot;prefix&quot;>min</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>116.67</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="width: 20.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1016.93em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-630"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.8em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-631"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-635"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-636"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-637" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1003.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.801em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-641"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-643" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4200</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-645" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-646" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.69em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.691em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7000</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.64em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">min</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.682em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-654"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-655"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">116.67</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-662"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-664"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-665"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>∆</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>θ</mo></mrow></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4200</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>7000</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mover><mo movablelimits="true" form="prefix">min</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mover><mo>=</mo><mn>116.67</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm \frac{ms∆θ}{t}=\frac{1\times4200\times15}{9}=7000\ J\min^{-1}=116.67\ Js^{-1}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="width: 5.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.26em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-669"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>∝</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm P\propto T\Rightarrow\frac{P}{T} </script></span>&nbsp;বনাম P&nbsp;লেখচিত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="width: 0.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-678"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-679"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm \frac{P}{T}</script></span> ধ্রুবক হওয়ায় এটি y-অক্ষের উপর লম্ব সরলরেখা।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>27℃ তাপমাত্রার 2 kg পানিকে 87°C তাপমাত্রায় নিলে এনট্রপির পরিবর্তন কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8400</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="width: 4.784em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সমচাপ প্রক্রিয়ায় আদর্শ তাপমাত্রা ও চাপের 1L&nbsp;বায়ুর আয়তন 5&nbsp;গুণ করা হলো। কৃতকাজ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="width: 18.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.248em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1015.25em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-768"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-777" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-779"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-784" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm W=PdV=1\times\left(5-1\right)\ L\ atm\ =\ 4\ L\ atm </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8.31</mn><mrow><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>8.31</mn><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>12.465</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\rm C_v=\frac{R}{\gamma-1}=\frac{8.31}{\frac{5}{3}-1}=\frac{8.31}{\frac{2}{3}}=12.465</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12.465</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8.31</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20.775</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-933" style="width: 18.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1015.17em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-934"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-957"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-958"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12.465</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8.31</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20.775</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm \therefore C_p=12.465+8.31=20.775\ Jmol^{-1}K^{-1}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>459.4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="width: 16.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1013.73em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-976"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-977"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-978"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-982" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.13em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-985"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">273</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-992"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">273</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1000"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.26em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">459.4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 2.297em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>273</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>459.4</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \frac{F-32}{9}=\frac{K-273}{5}=\frac{-273}{5}\therefore F=-459.4^\circ C</script></span></p>

<p>অর্থাৎ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>500</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1004" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.79em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1005"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1007"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.48em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.518em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>500</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm -500^\circ C</script></span>&nbsp;তাপমাত্রা অসম্ভব।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="width: 14.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1011.72em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1012"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm W=PdV=P\times0=0\therefore dV=0\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি অসমসত্ত্ব সাম্যাবস্থার উদাহরণ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

width: 0px; height: 2.461em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm PCl_5\left(g\right)\rightleftharpoons PCl_3\left(g\right)+Cl_2(g) </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                            <p>তাপোৎপাদী বিক্রিয়ার সাম্যাবস্থায় তাপমাত্রা হ্রাস করা হলে উৎপাদের পরিমাণ-</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.46em; left: 2.234em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1260"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1261"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.386em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\rm K_c=K_p\left(RT\right)^{-2} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="width: 24.346em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1265"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1266"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1276"><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1303"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.13em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1304"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1306"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.256em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1310"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1311"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></msub><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm K_p=K_c(RT)^{∆n}\ ;\ ∆n=2-4=-2\ \therefore K_p=K_c\left(RT\right)^{-2}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি বাফার দ্রবণে 0.2&nbsp;মোল দুর্বল মনোবেসিক এসিড <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.367em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1005.11em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1315"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1317"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1001.31em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1318"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1319"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.761em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">4.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm ({\rm pK}_a=4.8)\ </script></span> এবং 0.02 মোল এসিডের সোডিয়াম লবণ আছে। দ্রবণের pH&nbsp;মান কোনটি?&nbsp;</p>
