                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>0.02</mn><mn>0.2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="width: 29.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 23.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1023.89em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1328"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.31em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1333"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1334"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.768em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>0.02</mn><mn>0.2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>0.1</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4.8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>3.8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm pH={\rm pK}_a+\log{\frac{n_{salt}}{n_{acid}}}=4.8+\log{\frac{0.02}{0.2}}=4.8+\log{0.1}=4.8-1=3.8 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন এসিডের <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="width: 2.163em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="width: 2.707em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ঘনমাত্রার পরিবর্তন&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="width: 5.658em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1455"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1458"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); </span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো এক ক্ষারকীয় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1478" style="width: 5.553em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.547em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1004.44em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1479"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm Acid\ (HA)</script></span>&nbsp;এর বিয়োজন ধ্রুবক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="width: 5.479em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.473em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1004.47em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1490"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                         </div>
                                    </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 23 </span>
                                        </div>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.263em;">⇌</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1662"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 1.492em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1667" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.461em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\rm 2CO\left(g\right)+6H_2(g)\rightleftharpoons 2{\rm CH}_4(g)+2H_2O(g)</script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়ার সাম্যধ্রুবক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.776em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1738"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1739"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.46em; left: 2.37em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.386em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">\rm K_p=\left(K_{p1}\right)^2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm K_p=\frac{P_{CO}\times P^3_{H_2}}{P_{{\rm CH}_4}\times P_{H_2O}};K_{p1}=\frac{P_{{\rm CH}_4}^2\times P_{H_2O}^2}{P_{CO}^2\times P_{H_2}^6}=\frac{1}{K_P^2}\ \therefore K_P=\frac{1}{\sqrt{K_{p1}}} </script></span></p>
</span>

                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি ক্ষারীয় বাফার সিস্টেম?</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>উভমুখী বিক্রিয়ার সাম্যাবস্থায় মুক্ত শক্তির পরিবর্তন কত?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <span>Question 26 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.53em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2008"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; বিক্রিয়কের মোল। তাই চাপ কমালে সাম্যাবস্থা ডানে যাবে।</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>w</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1.75</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>12.25</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2043" style="width: 20.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1016.6em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2044"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2045"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.31em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2046"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2047"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.768em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2050" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2053"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2058"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1001.31em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2063"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2064"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.768em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2067" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">14</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2070" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.75</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12.25</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>14</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1.75</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>12.25</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-109">\rm {\rm pK}_a+pK_b=pK_w\Rightarrow{\rm pK}_a=14-1.75=12.25 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 28 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 30 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2295" style="width: 9.11em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="width: 15.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.71em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2344"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2345"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2346"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2347"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2349"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2350"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2351" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2352" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2356" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2357"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2358"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2360"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2361"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2363" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2369" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2371"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">V</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">\rm {10}^{-3}\times V+{10}^{-4}\times V=S\times\left(V+V\right)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2376" style="width: 13.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1010.78em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2377"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1002.67em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.309em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2382"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2383" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2384" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2385"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2386"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2387"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2389"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2390"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2391" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2392" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2397" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2398"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2399"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2401"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2402"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2403" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2404" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\rm \Rightarrow S=\frac{11\times{10}^{-4}}{2}=5.5\times{10}^{-4}\ M</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 32 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2462" style="width: 16.321em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.377em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1013.38em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2463"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2464"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.865em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.243em, 1001.42em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.455em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2466" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2467"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2468" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2469"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2470" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">&lt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2483" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">&lt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2486" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&lt;</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>&lt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-134">\rm \tan^2{\theta}+sec\theta=-1\ ;0<\theta<2\pi</script></span>&nbsp;হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2487" style="width: 0.598em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1000.49em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2488"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2489" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\rm \theta</script></span> এর মান কী হতে পারে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2490" style="width: 0.731em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.594em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1000.59em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2491"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2492" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-136">\pi </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2510" style="width: 19.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1015.7em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2511"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2512"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.68em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2513"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2514"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2515" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2516" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2517" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2518" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2519"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2521"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2522"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.945em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2524" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2525" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2526" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2527"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2530" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2532"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2534" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2535" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2536" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2543" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2544"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2545" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2546"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2555" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2557" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2558"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2559" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2560"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2561" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-140">\rm \frac{\sin^2{\theta}}{\cos^2{\theta}}+\frac{1}{cos\theta}=-1\Rightarrow\sin^2{\theta}+cos\theta=-\cos^2{\theta}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2562" style="width: 18.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1014.88em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2563"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2568" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2572"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2574" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2575"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2576" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2577"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2578" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2580" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2583"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2584" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2585"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2586" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2591" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2592" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2594" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">\rm \Rightarrow cos\theta=-(\sin^2{\theta}+\cos^2{\theta})=-1\therefore\theta=\pi</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">

clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.87em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.867em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-144">\frac{3\pi}{4} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-145-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2639" style="width: 1.414em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2646" style="width: 0.731em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.594em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1000.59em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2647"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2648" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-146">\pi </script></span></p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 56px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2705" style="width: 17.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.494em, 1014.72em, 2.912em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2706"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2708" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2763" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2795" style="width: 5.649em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
