                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2825" style="width: 7.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1006.07em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2826"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">\rm sin2\theta+3sin\theta=0</script></span>&nbsp;;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-156-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2840" style="width: 18.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1014.67em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2841"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2846" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2848"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2861" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2866" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2872" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>∵</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-156">\rm sin\theta\left(2cos\theta+3\right)=0\ [\because sin2\theta=2sin\theta\ cos\theta]</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-157-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="width: 5.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.39em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2880"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2887"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>≠</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-157">\rm cos\theta\neq-\frac{3}{2}\ ;\ </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;double-struck&quot;>Z</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2893" style="width: 11.273em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.223em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1009.18em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2894"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2902" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2905" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∈</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2910" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2911"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2912" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">Z</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>∈</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="double-struck">Z</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">\rm sin\theta=0\Rightarrow\theta=n\pi ;\ n\in\mathbb{Z}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-163-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2961" style="width: 0.731em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.594em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1000.59em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2962"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2963" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-163">\pi </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3040" style="width: 1.004em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3041"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3042"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3064" style="width: 16.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1013.89em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3065"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3070" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3072"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3073"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3074" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3075" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3076"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3077" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3078"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3080" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3081" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3083"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3084"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3085" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3092" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3094"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3095"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3096" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3097" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3098"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3099" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3100"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3101"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3103"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3104" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3105" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-172">\rm A+B=\tan^{-1}{2+\tan^{-1}{3}=\tan^{-1}{\frac{5}{1-6}}}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3107" style="width: 15.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.42em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3108"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3110" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3112"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3113"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3114" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3115" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3116"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3117" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3118"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3119"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3121"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3128" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3130"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3131"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3133" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3134"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3135" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3136"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3137"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3142" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.78em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3143"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3145" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-173">\rm =\tan^{-1}{\left(-1\right)}=\pi-\tan^{-1}{\left(1\right)}=\frac{3\pi}{4}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3279" style="width: 23.773em; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3294" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3295" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3296" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3298"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3299" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3309"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3310" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3311" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>ω</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">\rm =1\left(1+1\right)+0+\omega^2\left(\omega+\omega\right)=2+0+2\omega^3=2+2=4</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

top: -2.58em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-3561"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3562"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.51em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.338em, 1001.03em, 6.068em, -999.998em); top: -5.367em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-3544"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3545"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -2.58em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mtd" id="MathJax-Span-3564"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3565"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3566"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3567" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3568" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.469em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3569" style="vertical-align: 2.133em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Size4; top: -2.867em; left: 0em;">⎤<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Size4; top: -0.859em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.732em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><msup><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi></msup></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><msup><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi></msup></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">\rm A^n=\left[\begin{matrix}a^n&0&0\\0&a^n&0\\0&0&a^n\\\end{matrix}\right]</script></span>&nbsp;; যখন n&nbsp;ধনাত্মক জোড় সংখ্যা।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 39 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.725em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">\left[\begin{matrix}0&7&1\\7&0&0\\1&0&0\\\end{matrix}\right] </script></span></p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বক্র প্রতিসম ম্যাট্রিক্সের&nbsp;জন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-191-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3707" style="width: 4.264em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.49em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3708"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3712"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3714" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-191">\rm A=-A^T</script></span> হবে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-192-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>A, B, C ম্যাট্রিক্সত্রয়ের ক্রম যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3801" style="width: 9.838em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.05em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1008.01em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3802"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3811" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-194">3\times1,\ 1\times3,\ 1\times2</script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-195-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3816" style="width: 6.187em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3848" style="width: 1.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.07em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3849"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3850"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3852" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-200">\rm B^T</script></span> এর ক্রম:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3853" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.72em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3854"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">3\times1</script></span>&nbsp;। <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3858" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.67em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3859"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3862" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3864" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">\rm A+B^T</script></span> এর ক্রম:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3865" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.72em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3866"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3868" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-203">3\times1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-204-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3870" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3871"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3872" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-204">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-205-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3873" style="width: 6.109em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.96em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3874"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3875"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3876" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3877"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3880" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3882" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3883" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-205">\rm \left(A+B^T\right)\times C </script></span>&nbsp;এর ক্রম:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-206-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3886" style="width: 2.215em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ম্যাট্রিক্সের&nbsp;কোনো মান হয় না। শুধু নির্ণায়কের মান নির্ণয় করা সম্ভব।</p>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3947" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size3;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-215-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3984" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.846em, 1011.85em, 3.322em, -999.998em); vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4016" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4017" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4018" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-215">\rm \left|A\right|=6\therefore\left|\left(2A^{-1}\right)\right|=2^2\times\frac{1}{6}=\frac{2}{3} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-220-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4070" style="width: 1.004em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4071"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4072"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.139em; margin-left: 0.139em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.554em, 1000.41em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.415em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4073" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.32em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.641em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.18em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4074" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.55em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.05em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-221-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4075" style="width: 20.207em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4117" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-221">\rm cos\theta-sin\theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt2}\Rightarrow\cos{\frac{\pi}{4}}cos\theta-\sin{\frac{\pi}{4}}sin\theta=\frac{1}{2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-222-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4120" style="width: 18.814em;
