width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4153" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4155" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-222">\rm \Rightarrow\cos{\left(\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}\right)}=\cos{\frac{\pi}{3}}\Rightarrow\theta+\frac{\pi}{4}=2n\pi\pm\frac{\pi}{3}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-223-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4158" style="width: 20.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1016.44em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4159"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4160" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4161" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4165" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4167" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4168" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4169" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4170" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-4171" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-223">\rm \therefore\theta=2n\pi\pm\frac{\pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{4}\therefore\theta=\frac{\pi}{12}\ Or,\ option\ check</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-225-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; columnspacing=&quot;1em&quot;><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-4219" style="width: 8.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1006.8em, 4.018em, -999.998em); top: -2.949em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-4220"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-4221"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-4223" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-4243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.953em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-225">\rm A^2=\ \left[\begin{matrix}0&0\\0&0\\\end{matrix}\right] \therefore A</script></span>&nbsp;শূন্যঘাতি, যার সূচক ‘2’।</p>
</span>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Biology (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রফেসর আকবর সাজিদ</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ড. ইসহাক মোল্লা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রিন্সিপাল একজন কট্টর পাকিস্তানপন্থি, শিক্ষিত বাঙালি হওয়া সত্ত্বেও তিনি বাঙালি জাতীয়তাবাদের বিরোধিতা করেন। এদেশের স্বাধীনতার পথ রুদ্ধ করতে তিনি পাকিস্তানি সৈন্যদের নানা রকম পরামর্শ দেন।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>‘ডাক্তার ডাক’-কর্ম কারকে শূন্য বিভক্তি।&nbsp;<br>
এরূপ-আমাকে একখানা বই দাও। রবীন্দ্রনাথ পড়লাম।&nbsp;<br>
কর্তৃকারকে ষষ্ঠী বিভক্তি- আমার যাওয়া হয়নি।&nbsp;<br>
করণ কারকে শূন্য বিভক্তি- ছাত্ররা বল খেলে।&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ভাবের অভিব্যক্তি প্রকাশ করায় ‘কলসটি কানায় কানায় পূর্ণ’ ভাবাধিকরণ কারক। আর কানায়-য় থাকায় এটি সপ্তমী বিভক্তি।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বিরাট স্থানের যে কোনো অংশে ক্রিয়া সংঘটিত হলে তাকে ঐকদেশিক অধিকরণ বলে। যেমন- পুকুরে মাছ আছে। আকাশে চাঁদ উঠেছে ইত্যাদি।</p>

বৃন্দ: ভক্তবৃন্দ, সুধীবৃন্দ ;&nbsp;<br>
মন্ডলী: শিক্ষকমন্ডলী ;&nbsp;<br>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">Written Master Set: 1 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>
    </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) কোন তাপমাত্রায় সেলসিয়াস ও ফারেনহাইট স্কেলে&nbsp;10° পার্থক্য হয়? (০১)<br>
			(b) 9 sec এ কোনো বস্তুর তাপমাত্রা 287 K হতে&nbsp;332 K হলে, ফারেনহাইট স্কেলে তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধির হার কত? (১.৫)</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(a)&nbsp;এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>10</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 5.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.63em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>10</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm C-F=\pm10</script></span></p>

<p>তাহলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-9" style="width: 11.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.387em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1009.39em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-10"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-11"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-14" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-15" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-16"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-17" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-23"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-30"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.85em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>±</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \frac{C}{5}=\frac{F-32}{9}\Rightarrow\frac{F\pm10}{5}=\frac{F-32}{9}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>90</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>160</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="width: 9.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.03em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-36"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">90</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">160</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>9</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>±</mo><mn>90</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>160</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \Rightarrow9F\pm90=5F-160</script></span></p>

<p>(b)&nbsp;এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></mrow><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="width: 7.174em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>332</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>287</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>81</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="width: 14.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1011.56em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-118"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-129"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">332</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">287</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-135" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-136" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">81</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>332</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>287</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>81</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm \therefore∆F=\frac{9}{5}\times\left(332-287\right)=81^\circ F</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-140"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধির হার&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>81</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="width: 6.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.58em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-143"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">81</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-151" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-153"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-154"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>81</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>9</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm =\frac{81}{9}=9^\circ F/sec</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
(a) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>62.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>52.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="width: 10.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.73em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-160"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-164"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.72em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">62.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.764em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-170"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.72em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">52.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.764em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>62.5</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>52.5</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm F=-62.5^\circ F=-52.5^\circ C</script></span>; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>17.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mn>27.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="width: 10.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.73em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-175"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-179"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.72em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.764em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-185"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.72em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">27.5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.764em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>17.5</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mn>27.5</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm F=-17.5^\circ F=-27.5^\circ C</script></span>; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
(b) ∆F = 81℉ ; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধির হার = 9℉/sec নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: justify;">একটি কার্নো ইঞ্জিনের কর্মদক্ষতা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="width: 0.859em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1000.71em, 2.722em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-190"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-191"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\frac{2}{3}</script></span>। এর তাপ গ্রাহকের তাপমাত্রাকে আরো 165 K বৃদ্ধি করলে দক্ষতা অর্ধেক হয়। তাহলে তাপ উৎস ও তাপ গ্রাহকের তাপমাত্রা নির্ণয় কর। তাপ গ্রাহকের তাপমাত্রা স্থির রেখে দক্ষতা অর্ধেক করা সম্ভব কি?&nbsp;</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="width: 11.723em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-223" style="width: 9.346em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p>আবার,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03B7;</mi><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-240"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-241"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.54em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.543em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">165</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-273"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.54em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.543em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>η</mi><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>165</mn></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>165</mn></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm \eta^\prime=\frac{1}{3}=1-\frac{T_2+165}{T_1}\Rightarrow\frac{2}{3}=\frac{T_2+165}{T_1}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>165</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>165</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="width: 19.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1016.31em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-277"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">165</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-291"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-293" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-296"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-298" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">165</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>165</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>165</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm \Rightarrow T_2+165=\frac{2}{3}\times3\ T_2=2T_2\Rightarrow T_2=165\ K</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>165</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>495</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="width: 12.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1010em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-308"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-314" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-316"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">165</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">495</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>165</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>495</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm \therefore T_1=\left(3\times165\right)K=495\ K</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-327"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\therefore</script></span> তাপ উৎসের তাপমাত্রা 495 K ও তাপ গ্রাহকের তাপমাত্রা 165 K।</p>

<p>তাপ গ্রাহকের তাপমাত্রা স্থির রেখে দক্ষতা অর্ধেক করলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>165</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="width: 5.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.3em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-330"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-331"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-332" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">165</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-339"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>165</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm\frac{1}{3}=1-\frac{165}{T_1}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>165</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>165</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>247.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="width: 15.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.75em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-343"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.82em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-347"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative;
