font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.93em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-360"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">165</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">247.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>165</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>165</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>247.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{165}{T_1}=\frac{2}{3}\therefore T_1=\frac{165\times3}{2}=247.5\ K</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-370"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;তাপ গ্রাহকের তাপমাত্রা স্থির রেখে তাপ উৎসের তাপমাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>495</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>247.5</mn><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>&amp;#x2218;</mo></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="width: 6.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1005.62em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-373"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">495</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">247.5</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-378"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">∘</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>495</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>247.5</mn><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm (495-247.5)^\circ C</script></span>&nbsp;বা,&nbsp;247.5℃&nbsp;&nbsp;হ্রাস করলে দক্ষতা অর্ধেক হতো।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>165</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="width: 5.33em; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>495</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="width: 5.084em; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>247.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="width: 5.822em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-402"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-403"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">247.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>247.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm T_1=247.5\ K</script></span> ; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর<br>
উৎসের তাপমাত্রা 247.5℃ হ্রাস করলে দক্ষতা অর্ধেক হতো; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td style="text-align: justify;">একটি বল স্থির অবস্থা থেকে নির্দিষ্ট বেগে গতি প্রাপ্ত হয়ে একটি দেওয়ালে আঘাত করে। আঘাতের ফলে বলের তাপমাত্রা 0.5℃ বৃদ্ধি পায় ও বলে 90% গতিশক্তি অবশিষ্ট থাকে। দেওয়ালে আঘাত করার মুহূর্তে বলের বেগ কত ছিল নির্ণয় কর। [বলের উপাদানের আপেক্ষিক তাপ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>4000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="width: 9.912em;                                 </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.9</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="width: 8.199em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="width: 13.158em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="width: 15.084em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4000</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4000</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm \Rightarrow0.1\times\frac{1}{2}\times\left(v^2-0\right)=4000\times0.5</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>40000</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="width: 10.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1008.73em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-496"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.83em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.432em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-503"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4000</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.34em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-507"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.994em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40000</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4000</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>0.1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>40000</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm \Rightarrow v^2=\frac{4000\times0.5}{0.1\times0.5}=40000</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1005.58em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-514"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">200</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-520"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-521"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-522"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-525"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-526"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm \therefore v=200\ {\rm ms}^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;; আঘাতের মুহূর্তে বলের বেগ।&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>40000</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="width: 4.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.89em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-530"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-531"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">40000</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>40000</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm v^2=40000</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="width: 5.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.8em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-537"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">200</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-542"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-543"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-544"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-547"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-548"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm v=200\ {\rm ms}^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>একটি রেফ্রিজারেটরে প্রতি চক্রে অপসারিত তাপ 300J ও পরিবেশে বর্জিত তাপ 350J হলে, প্রতি চক্রে কৃতকাজ ও কার্যকৃত সহগ কত?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>350</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="width: 16.109em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1013.16em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-552"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-565"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">350</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">300</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">J</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>350</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>300</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm W=Q_2-Q_1=\left(350-300\right)J=50\ J </script></span></p>

<p>এখন,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>300</mn><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="width: 8.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1006.52em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-576"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>300</mn><mn>50</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">\rm K=\frac{Q_1}{W}=\frac{300}{50}=6</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-591"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;প্রতি চক্রে কৃতকাজ 50J ও কার্যকৃত সহগ 6।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="width: 4.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-594"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm W=50\ J</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="width: 2.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.13em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-601"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-604" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm K=6</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (4)</h2>

			<td>(a) অসওয়াল্ডের লঘুকরণ সূত্রটি লেখ। (০১)<br>
			(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.01</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="width: 9.652em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-619"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-620"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(a) লঘু দ্রবণে মৃদু তড়িৎবিশ্লেষ্য যেমন মৃদু এসিড বা ক্ষারকের বিয়োজন মাত্রা ঐ অম্ল বা ক্ষারকের দ্রবণের মোলার ঘনমাত্রার বর্গমূলের ব্যস্তানুপাতিক।</p>

<p>(b)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="width: 4.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.02em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-627"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm CH_3COOH</script></span>&nbsp;মৃদু এসিড বলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="width: 6.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.96em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-637"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-638"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-639" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-640"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-641"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-644"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4.2</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-652" style="width: 10.207em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="width: 0.658em; <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong><br>
(a) অসওয়াল্ডের লঘুকরণ সূত্রটি লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="width: 8.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.56em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-725"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-732"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-733"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-735"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-736"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.2</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm \alpha C=4.2\times{10}^{-4}M</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6</span>
                                            
                                        </div>

		<tr>
			<td>(a) বিক্রিয়াগুলোর জন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="width: 1.641em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.34em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-789"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-790"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.343em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-792" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\rm K_P</script></span> এর রাশিমালা লেখ। (১.৫)<br>
			(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm (a)\ K_{P_1}=\frac{P_B\times P_C}{\left(P_A\right)^2}\ ;\ K_{P_2}=\frac{P_C\times P_D}{\left(P_B\right)^2}\ ;\ K_{P_3}=\frac{\left(P_P\right)^2}{\left(P_C\right)^2\times P_D}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mn>1</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mn>2</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>×</mo><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mn>3</mn><mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm K=K_1^\prime\times K_2^\prime\times K_3^\prime=\frac{1}{5}\times1\times\frac{1}{4}=\frac{1}{20}(Ans.)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong></p>

4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1119" 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1140" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">D</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.32em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.322em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></msub></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm K_{P_1}=\frac{P_B\times P_C}{\left(P_A\right)^2}\ ;\ K_{P_2}=\frac{P_C\times P_D}{\left(P_B\right)^2}\ ;\ K_{P_3}=\frac{\left(P_P\right)^2}{\left(P_C\right)^2\times P_D}</script></span><strong>&nbsp;</strong>লেখার জন্য (০.৫×৩) = ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p>(b)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1141" style="width: 3.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.62em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1142"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>20</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm K=\frac{1}{20}</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) বাফার ক্ষমতা কী? (০১)<br>
			(b) রক্তের বাইকার্বনেট বাফার সিস্টেমের উপাদানসমূহ লেখ এবং হেন্ডারসন-হ্যাসেলবাখ সমীকরণ দেখাও। (১.৫)</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">(a) এক লিটার বাফার দ্রবণের pH&nbsp;এর মান এক একক পরিবর্তন করতে যতো মোল সংখ্যার সবল এসিড বা ক্ষার মিশ্রিত বা যোগ করতে হয়, তাকে ঐ বাফার দ্রবণের বাফার ক্ষমতা বলে।<br>
(b) রক্তের বাফার সিস্টেমে বিদ্যমান এসিড <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1148" style="width: 3.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.54em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1149"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1150"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1154"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\rm H_2CO_3</script></span> এবং লবণ বা অনুবন্ধী ক্ষার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1157" style="width: 2.871em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1158"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1159"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.871em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.22em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1160"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1161"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); <p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1168"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;হেন্ডারসন-হ্যাসেলবাখ সমীকরণ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1170" style="width: 9.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.658em, 1008.08em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1171"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong><br>
(a) বাফার ক্ষমতা এর সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>(a) পানির অটো-আয়নীকরণ কী? (০১)<br>
			(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="width: 3.69em;
