			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">(a) পোলার পানি অণু নিজেই অতি স্বল্পমাত্রায় আয়নিত হয়ে ধনাত্মক আয়ন ও ঋণাত্মক আয়ন যেমন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="width: 2.256em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 5.289em; height: 1.436em; vertical-align: -0.08em; position: absolute; top: -1.064em; left: 0em;"></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.117em, 1004.8em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1434"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1435"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1436"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1438"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1441"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><menclose notation="box"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">q</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></menclose></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm Cu^{2+}\left(aq\right)+4H_2O\left(l\right)\rightleftharpoons Cu\left(OH\right)_2\left(aq\right)+\fbox{$\rm 2H_3O^+(aq)$}</script></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">দ্রবণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="width: 2.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.13em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1449"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1450"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1453"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm H_3O^+</script></span> আয়নের সংখ্যা বাড়ার কারণে দ্রবণে pH&nbsp;এর মান 7&nbsp;এর চেয়ে কম হয়; অর্থাৎ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.5em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1457"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">u</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1461"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm CuSO_4</script></span> এর দ্রবণটি অম্লীয় হয়।<br>
<strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong><br>
(a) পানির অটো-আয়নীকরণ এর সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
(b) বিক্রিয়ার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
ব্যাখ্যার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>

                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (4)</h2>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>240</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1841" style="width: 12.215em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;"                         </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

<p>এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="vertical-align: 1.436em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -1.883em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -2.58em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2383" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.158em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>a</mi></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mi>a</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\rm \left|P\right|=\left|\begin{matrix}a&2\\2&a\\\end{matrix}\right|=a^2-4</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2386" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1011.8em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2387"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2388" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2389" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2391" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2397" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2399" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2403" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\rm \therefore a^2-4=5\Rightarrow a^2=9\ \therefore a=\pm3</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2408" style="width: 3.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.5em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2409"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2410"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm \left|P\right|=5</script></span></strong>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৭৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2416" style="width: 5.248em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2425" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2428" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.54em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2429"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\rm a=\pm3</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        <div class="serial">

height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-107">\rm \cos^{-1}{\frac{x}{a}}+\cos^{-1}{\frac{y}{b}}=\theta</script></span>&nbsp;হলে প্রমাণ কর,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.68em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">\rm \frac{x^2}{a^2}-\frac{2xy}{ab}cos\theta+\frac{y^2}{b^2}=\sin^2{\theta}</script></span></td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msqrt><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2530" style="width: 18.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1015.37em, 4.018em, -999.998em); top: -2.949em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2531"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2585" style="width: 15.822em; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-113">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{x^2y^2}{a^2b^2}-\frac{2xy}{ab}\ cos\theta+\cos^2{\theta}=1+\frac{x^2y^2}{a^2b^2}-\frac{x^2}{a^2}-\frac{y^2}{b^2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2748" style="width: 14.756em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2790" style="width: 16.273em; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2819" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2822" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2824" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2825"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2826" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2827"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2828" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm \therefore\frac{x^2}{a^2}-\frac{2xy}{ab}cos\theta+\frac{y^2}{b^2}=\sin^2{\theta}\ [Proved]</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="width: 11.395em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2893"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2894" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="font-size: 70.7%; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2906"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2913" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2915" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2916"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2917" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2918"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2919" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm \frac{x^2}{a^2}-\frac{2xy}{ab}cos\theta+\frac{y^2}{b^2}=\sin^2{\theta}</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;প্রমাণের জন ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12</span>

		<tr>

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2935" style="width: 15.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1012.75em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2936"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2937" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2938"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2939" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2940"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2941" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2942" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2947" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2948" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2951" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2952"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2953" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2954" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2955" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2956" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2957" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1002.71em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.564em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2958"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2959" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2960" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2961"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2962" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 1.027em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2963" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2964" style="font-size: 70.7%;"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2965" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2966"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2967" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.83em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2972" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\rm \tan{2\theta}.tan\theta=1\Rightarrow\frac{2tan\theta}{1-\tan^2{\theta}}.tan\theta=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2975" style="width: 16.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1013.57em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2976"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2979" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2981" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2982"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2983" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2984"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2985" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2989" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2991" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2992"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2993" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2994"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2995" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2998" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3000" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3001"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3002" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3003"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3004" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\rm \Rightarrow2\tan^2{\theta}=1-\tan^2{\theta}\Rightarrow3\tan^2{\theta}=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3007" style="width: 15.617em; top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3008"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\rm \Rightarrow tan\theta=\pm\frac{1}{\sqrt3}\Rightarrow tan\theta=\tan{\left(\pm\frac{\pi}{6}\right)}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;double-struck&quot;>Z</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3039" style="width: 8.814em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3040"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3041" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3042" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3045" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3047" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3048" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.166em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∈</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3053" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3054"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3055" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">Z</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>π</mi><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>∈</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="double-struck">Z</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\rm \therefore\theta=n\pi\pm\frac{\pi}{6};n\in\mathbb{Z}</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3056" style="width: 7.297em; padding-left: 0.166em;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3079" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3080" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\rm \frac{2tan\theta}{1-\tan^2{\theta}}.tan\theta=1</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৭৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3082" style="width: 5.371em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.387em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.39em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3083"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3087" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3091" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-3092"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3093"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3094" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">\rm tan\theta=\pm\frac{1}{\sqrt3}</script></span> ; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৭৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x2208;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;double-struck&quot;>Z</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3095" style="width: 7.871em;
